text: @kylegriffin1 @cryborg This stupidity is mine boggling. Just because #Dotard calls it a racist name and makes racists cheer #KungFlu and are full of hate doesn’t mean you can’t catch the virus! It’s still a VIRUS and 🇺🇸 people are dying or having serious health issues due to #COVID19! 🤦🏻‍♀️😷
